about_the_game:
Hoard Hotel is a retro-styled story-driven Adventure game with an emphasis on social interaction, humour, light puzzle solving, and unknown horrors. Playing as a common day thief intending to rob the wealthy guests of the hotel, you quickly begin to uncover dark secrets and horrifying truths that all link to the mysteries shrouding the building. It is up to you face the Guests, earn positive reviews, and make it out alive!

50 Weird and Wacky Guests - Your mission is to earn a shining review from each of the

50 tenants that inhabit the hotel. From cultists to retired comedians, there's no shortage of

variety here! With each new floor that you explore, you'll never know what's behind the door..

Crack the Case - As you climb higher and higher, you may eventually reach the dark truth that

lies within the hotel. Gather clues by speaking to tenants or exploring the hotel rooms, and

use them to reach horrifying revelations. Why is there a crazy blue skinned scientist conducting

weird experiments? Where is the CEO? And why is the building run by a Kangaroo A.I?!

Multiple Endings - This story doesn't end one way. Influence the world and characters from

your own actions. Will the hotel meet a grisly fate? Or will you tie up every loose end? The

choice is yours.

3 Playable Characters - Select from Hugo, Locke, or Ms. Mime, and get unique reactions, outcomes, and dialogue from Guests! With three character choices, unlockables, and multiple ways to end reach the story's end, Hoard Hotel is replay friendly!

Collectables Abound - Players can earn rewards for optional collectables in each room,

such as detailed reports for each Guest that offers additional information about the

characters and world!

Retro Goodness - Experience a game that has been designed to bring you back to the 16-Bit retro gaming days of old, with chunky pixels, and an original sound track that emulates classic retro gaming hardware. Don't worry, you won't even have to blow on any cartridges!

Welcome to the Hoard Hotel family!

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains Adult themes such as mentioning illegal drug use, sexual innuendo and implied sexual themes, minor swearing, and some scenes depicting gore, violence, death, or themes of suicide and self-harm. Also contains themes of horror.
